subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur was visibly frustrated after Jaromir Jagr scored on a wrist shot that hit Brodeur in the back before going in. Only 23 seconds later, Sean Avery scored on a rebound shot.
snippet: Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur was visibly frustrated after Jaromir Jagr scored on a wrist shot that hit Brodeur in the back before going in. Only 23 seconds later, Sean Avery scored on a rebound shot.
